q: article,`` Justin Bieber Fans wait hours at David Letterman ( studios) for glimpse.'' During his interview with David Letterman , Justin Bieber made comments about the people outside. Justin Bieber was smiling and David Letterman responded that has never happened to me. David Letterman continued about how girls scream to Justin Bieber wherever he goes. gate to halt looting. Zahi Hawass said the Egyptian Museum's collection is now secure from thieves. The greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched firetrucks spray water on the smoldering NDP headquarters. The museum, home to the gold mask of King Tutankhamun that draws millions of tourists a year, also houses thousands of artifacts
